name: Dylan Dog 10: I Vampiri
overview: Dylan Dog 10: I Vampiri is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Simulmondo, which was released in Europe in 1993. In the light of day, in everyday life, everything seems so "normal". But there is something beneath the surface, something invisible that devours us, hypnotizes us, sucks our blood. Who was Paco Martinez? A drug dealer or the keeper of a terrible secret? Why did the army kill him so lightly? The face of power is clean and smiling, but that smile is made of long fangs ...
